name: oh-my-opencode-theseus
description: Agent orchestration plugin for OpenCode - the Ship of Theseus evolution of oh-my-opencode

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target bun --format esm && bun build src/cli/index.ts --outdir dist/cli --target bun --format esm && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.deploy: bun test && bun run build && cp dist/index.js ../plugins/oh-my-opencode-theseus.js && cp dist/cli/index.js ../plugins/cli/index.js && cp -r commands ../plugins/
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
